text:
Hi!
Is it possible to use the HubSpot API Client without a SSL certificate? From localhost for example.
Thanks!

hello API peoples - I have been trying to use the Imports API and keep getting “POST Error 400 - Unable to process JSON”.

My real question is around how the import needs to be formatted. I am using PHP Guzzle and passing in the multipart file on files variable and passing in the json string to the ‘importRequest’ variable.

Anyone run into this before?

Hello! We're looking to send automated email utilizing HubSpot Templates. For instance when a user register onto our website can we utilize the HubSpot template to send to the user via API. Is this possible? Any limitations? Example attached.

HubSpot does have subscription widgets for this and signup forms that trigger automated emails for joining.

Most of what you’re asking for is very broad and would need a bit more explanation.

As for the API this is your best reference for now until they release v3 docs:
<https://legacydocs.HubSpot.com/docs/methods/lists/marketing-email-overview>

Hey there - would anyone mind explaining in a bit more detail how cardinality and inverse cardinality works, specifically as far as schema associations are concerned?

I’m fairly familiar with relationships generally (at least, with ActiveRecord) but…I’m wondering why “many-to-one” isn’t an option, among other things. I’m thinking if someone can give me a broad view of how this works in HubSpot, it’ll dispel this confusion.

I’d think that if I’m making a one-to-many relationship going one way, I’m by definition creating a many-to-one  relationship going the other way. But that doesn’t even seem to be an optional parameter when making a request to the API.

I realize I’m confused and would greatly appreciate anyone’s attempt to clarify this for me!
